name: GREYBRIGHT OS v13 – The Eternal Door

Caer Dhu Battlements.description: Cold stone under a blood-red moon. Rain lashes the ruins. A torch flickers ahead.

Town Square.description: Cobblestones slick with mist. Garrick the Wanderer mutters about the old war—missing two fingers, as always.

Garrick the Wanderer.description: Old man, ragged cloak, mutters about the war. Missing two fingers on left hand.

characters.story_summary: You awaken in the ruins of Caer Dhu, a fallen fortress on the edge of Ironspire. Whispers of ancient curses linger in the wind.
